RelatedSentence: New Delhi : Prime Minister - designate Narendra Modi is set to meet President Pranab Mukherjee on Tuesday and stake claim to form the new government .
New Delhi : Prime Minister - designate Narendra Modi is set to meet President Pranab Mukherjee on Tuesday and stake claim to form the new government .
Ahead of that the Bharatiya Janata Party 's parliamentary board will anoint him as their leader .
Advani will be proposing Modi 's name at the parliamentary board meeting and senior leaders Venkaiah Naidu , Jaitley , Murli Manohar Joshi , Sushma Swaraj among others will second it .
Advani will be proposing Modi 's name at the parliamentary board meeting and senior leaders Venkaiah Naidu , Jaitley , Murli Manohar Joshi , Sushma Swaraj among others will second it .
Sources say BJP President Rajnath Singh will get the Home Ministry while Arun Jaitley could be the new Finance Minister .
Sources say BJP President Rajnath Singh will get the Home Ministry while Arun Jaitley could be the new Finance Minister .
Sources also say that Murli Manohar Joshi could be the Defence Minister .
However , sources add that party patriarch LK Advani could be asked to be a guiding light for the party .
Goa Chief Minister Manohar Parrikar also met Modi in Delhi on Tuesday morning .
BJP ally Shiromani Akali Dal 's chief Parkash Singh Badal has said that his party will not accept any ministry .
BJP ally Shiromani Akali Dal 's chief Parkash Singh Badal has said that his party will not accept any ministry .
Hectic meetings have been continuing since May 16 , the day the BJP got absolute majority .
Meanwhile , the date of Modi 's oath taking ceremony is also likely to be decided on Tuesday in the BJP 's parliamentary board meeting .
